author: Yasmin Limbert
method: Preheat the oven to 160C/350F/Gas 4.   Combine all the dry ingredients in a bowl, add the egg yolk and vanilla and mix well to form a dough. Lightly knead the dough on a floured work surface until smooth then shape into a log and place on a baking tray lined with parchment.   Bake for 25 minutes, allow to cool, then cut into slices about 1cm/½in thick.  Place slices onto the baking tray and bake again for 5-10 minutes.
ingredients: 90g/3¼oz plain flour,  1 tsp baking powder,  55g/2oz sugar,  35g/1¼oz pistachios,  25g/1oz dark chocolate chips,  1 free-range egg yolk,  ½ tsp vanilla paste
